tags: Doctor friendliness,Treatment satisfaction,
review: The Doctor is proficient and polite. Explained procedure clearly. His staff and technicians are friendly and competent.

tags: Explanation of the health issue,
review: I saw Dr Anurag Singh, as recommended by my dentist, for a second opinion about a TMJ ailment. I liked the fact that Dr Anurag made his own examination and assessment before looking at the MRI report and the opinion of the first consultant. He spent a considerable time explaining to me, with the help of drawings and a 3 D skull model, how the jaw works and where and why there is a limitation in my jaw movement.  He also provided some insights on how to treat the ailment. I would recommend highly a consultation with Dr Anurag if you are suffering from a TMJ disorder.

tags: Explanation of the health issue,
review:
I have been associated with Dr Singh for around 15 years. 

I had terrible teeth and gums issues owing to the gross neglect on my part for many years.

Dr Singh has been extremely accommodating to my needs as I live overseas and can only visit him for a few days. I have had multiple visits to his clinic over a long span of time and always found Dr Singh:

Professional
Efficient
Explains the procedure well 
Quality conscious
Fair and Friendly
Excellent Follow up service

I have no hesitation is recommending Dr Singh to anyone seeking quality work at reasonable price.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,
review:
I think if a patient is given appointment as the patient respects doctors time same is expected from clinic. 

Waiting for 1 hours is too much, apart from that clinic service are good.

tags: Doctor friendliness,Explanation of the health issue,Treatment satisfaction,Value for money,Wait time,
context: Surgical Tooth Extraction,Dental Checkup (General),Dental Implant Fixing,
review: Dr Anurag examined my father who is 77 years and shared that surgical extraction was the best remedy for his condition. After that it was all done in a matter of a few mins. The extraction was not a simple one since the roots were quite deep and looked like a hockey stick impacting the adjoining tooth. The procedure was done without any inconvenience or pain and it was a super smooth process. Amazing job! ** ** ******* *** ** *** **** ******* *** * ******* ** ****** ******** ** ******
reply_text: Thanks Sandeep for the kind words and a positive feedback.
